join.heading: Register
join.message: Membership gives you access to all areas of the site, including full membership-only contests and the ability to submit content to share with the site and other members.

login.heading: Login
login.message: Please enter your login details to access full membership-only contests and the ability to submit content to share with the site and other members.

account.heading: Manage Your Account
account.message: Help us get to know you better, manage your communication preferences, or change your password.

forgot-password.heading: Password Reset
forgot-password.message: Forgot your password? No worries, it happens. We'll send you a password reset email.

cookies-required.heading: Cookies Required
cookies-required.message: It doesn't look like your browser is letting us set a cookie. These small bits of information are stored in your browser and allow us to ensure you stay logged in. They are required to use the site and can generally be authorized in your browser's preferences or settings screen.

reset-password.heading: Reset Password
reset-password.message: Enter your new password to reset it.

verify-email.heading: Email Verification
verify-email.message: Please verify that your profile email belongs to you.
